task.title: Using the UF-80 USB Viewer
task.shortdesc: The UF-80 USB Viewer is a technology that can help optimize one's learning experience by enlarging a document so that everyone in the room can view it at once.

taskbody.prereq: For the UF-80 USB Viewer to work properly, make sure it is plugged into a wall outlet and a projector.

step.cmd: On the UF-80 USB Viewer, press the power button on the far right of the selection of buttons.
Place the object you want to show directly underneath the light of the object. Turn the lamp on if necessary for viewing.
Twist the top of the device clockwise to zoom in and counterclockwise to zoom out.
Turn the device back off once you finish using it.
